title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Fireplace Wall Mantel, Furniture", 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite.
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: B
description: Design for fireplace wall mantel for Jascha Heifetz apartment. Rectilinear fireplace with reflective surface, either tile or polished stone. Smooth, undecorated surface above fireplace. Adjacent two-door cabinet to right of fireplace. Handles for cabinet are narrow and rectilinear.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Fireplace Wall Mantel, Furniture", 1935.
1935. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite.. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-260.
